GlobalVariables.Name: __WeeklyType
MultiLineComment: Last:    for last weekday of the month at fiscal year end
Nearest: for last weekday nearest the end of month

GlobalVariables.Name: __WorkingDays
GlobalVariables.Comment: Set the working days - 0 = Sunday, 1 = Monday, ... 6 = Saturday

GlobalVariables.Name: __WorkingDayType
GlobalVariables.Comment: Description of working daysfor Working Day column

GlobalVariables.Name: __NonWorkingDayType
GlobalVariables.Comment: Description of non-working days for Working Day column

GlobalVariables.Name: __OffsetYears
GlobalVariables.Comment: Increase range of fiscal years before/after boundaries defined

Columns.Name: Sequential Day Number

than the last period with data.
